title: Strikes along Israel's border with Lebanon are again fueling fears of a widening war
description: A series of deadly strikes on Wednesday and Thursday underscored the risk that daily cross-border skirmishes could quickly escalate and turn the war in Gaza into a broader regional conflict.

title: Oscars, take note: 'Poor Things' built its weird, unforgettable world from scratch
description: Oddsmakers say Barbie will win this year's Oscar for production design. Our critic makes the case for Poor Things, which methodically builds a unique world for its main character to thrive within.

title: The 'food' you see on-screen often isn't real food. Not so, in 'The Taste of Things'
description: Food stylists will sometimes swap glue for milk and coat meat with motor oil. But on the set of The Taste of Things, the meals were real — and the actors kept eating after the director yelled "Cut!"

title: Amanda Gorman's poetry and Bach's music offer joint message of hope
description: Poet Amanda Gorman and German cellist Jan Vogler combine poetry and Bach's cello suites at New York's Carnegie Hall to share the "lows and highs" of human experience.
